Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to enhancing the application process for the New York city identity card
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Enhancing the application process for the New York city identity card.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to reintroduce and pass, and the Governor to sign A.3506/S.2235, also known as the New York for All Act, which would prohibit and regulate the discovery and disclosure of immigration status by New York state and local government entities.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass and the Governor to sign A.270/S.141, also known as the Access to Representation Act, which establishes the right to legal counsel in immigration court proceedings and provides for the administration thereof.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Access to Representation Act, which establishes the right to legal counsel in immigration court proceedings and provides for the administration thereof (A.270/S.141).

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to enhancing the application process for the New York city identity card
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amendment Proposed by Comm
Items.MatterName: Enhancing the application process for the New York city identity card.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to enhancing the application process for the New York city identity card
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amended by Committee
Items.MatterName: Enhancing the application process for the New York city identity card.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to enhancing the application process for the New York city identity card
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Approved by Committee
Items.MatterName: Enhancing the application process for the New York city identity card.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to reintroduce and pass, and the Governor to sign A.3506/S.2235, also known as the New York for All Act, which would prohibit and regulate the discovery and disclosure of immigration status by New York state and local government entities.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Amendment Proposed by Comm

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to reintroduce and pass, and the Governor to sign A.3506/S.2235, also known as the New York for All Act, which would prohibit and regulate the discovery and disclosure of immigration status by New York state and local government entities.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Amended by Committee

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to reintroduce and pass, and the Governor to sign A.3506/S.2235, also known as the New York for All Act, which would prohibit and regulate the discovery and disclosure of immigration status by New York state and local government entities.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass and the Governor to sign A.270/S.141, also known as the Access to Representation Act, which establishes the right to legal counsel in immigration court proceedings and provides for the administration thereof.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
